fields.description:
Edits dir must be listed in both dfs.namenode.edits.dir and dfs.namenode.edits.dir.required for the later to take effect. 
We should throw an invalid configuration error when a dir is in .required but not in dfs.namenode.edits.dir
fields.summary: Edits dir in dfs.namenode.edits.dir.required will be silently ignored if it is not in dfs.namenode.edits.dir
